name: Light 1/5m Timer
info:
Takes an input of the template used to determine on time. Output is for turning off the light.

NOTE: Node will output any home assistant API errors for catching with the 'catch all' node

Configuration
template string
Jinja template to be rendered, discarded if `msg.template` is provided via input msg
Inputs
template string
Jinja template to be rendered
Outputs
template string
The original template sent to home assistant for rendering
payload string
The rendered template

name: Living Room Lights Should Turn On

delay required or notify fails to notify if both are over 90
Let Christy Know Seth Left Work
Count Difference
Count the number of tracked devices in the house and compare them to the known "family member" devices
hass REST api is the only way to create and update a read only sensor
Travel Time update between seth and christy send html5 notification
dT minutes
